91.0: Specifically, samples with 0.075 mL of sol mixture experienced least inhibiting effects from silica particles, thereby recorded a comparable transmittance (90%) with uncoated glass slides (91%).

93.0: In the investigation performed by Ebert and Bhushan (2012) the performance of ZnO, SiO2 and ITO (indium tin oxide) functionalized nano-particles was compared, and contact-angle values obtained were of, respectively, 165, 165 and 154° for transmittance values of 90%, 87% and 93%.

99.5: More recently, C. Wang et al. (2014) produced superhydrophobic Sol–Gel coatings using with SiO2 nanoparticles sizes from 12 to 40 nm, different solvents and curing temperatures and managed to obtain transmittance values of up to 99.5% (at 550 nm wavelength) associated with 152° contact angles.
